attributes.action: Have CCTV Cameras installed to stop thefts and Vandalism at Lanarkshire Cemetery
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
At Priestfiled Cemetery, Blantyre there has been thefts of wreaths, vandalsim of the things at my partner James O'Neills place of rest.
Toys my daughter has left as been taken, flowers burned and nothing gets done, we need cctv to help catch these people since the police are doing nothing about it!!!

rejection.details: This is a matter for direct communication with your local council
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
